name: Court Musician
description:
Can you help the Royal court musician play the hottest hits of 1680 for the King? Just click the Harpsichord keys when they appear on screen to play music. It is a very simple and "very original" concept... What could possibly go wrong??? You will  find more control info in game. Can you trigger the main menu Easter egg? You'll know when you find it.

A game made with Godot Engine by Spyridon Glarakis for the "Unexpected Jam" (2020).

Hope you enjoy! :)
